definition: to drag along/to haul/(fig.) to procrastinate/shilly-shallying/sluggish/(computing) drag and drop/(loanword) tola, unit of weight, approx. 11.664 grams
to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Jesus' day, farmers didn't have tractors or planters.
sentences.chinese: 在耶穌的時代，農夫沒有拖拉機和播種機。
手扶拖拉機的產量增長了7倍。

sentences.english: And is it Mule, MULE or MUL-E?
Farm machines that use fossil fuels, like blows plows and tractors, would not be needed either.
sentences.chinese: 用石油驅動的農機，比如犁和拖拉機，也不需要了。

sentences.english: Integrity and the driver of the tractor repaired, small weeks without village to find schumann.
sentences.chinese: 正直和司機小周把拖拉機修好，沒有進村去找舒曼。

sentences.english: Tom alone can drive this tractor.
sentences.chinese: 只有湯姆纔會開這臺拖拉機。

sentences.english: This kind of walking tractor runs on diesel oil.
sentences.chinese: 這種手扶拖拉機靠柴油運轉。

sentences.english: The tractor shape design is a highly integrated cross-disciplinary.
sentences.chinese: 拖拉機形態設計是一項高度綜合性的交叉學科。

sentences.english: The farmer built a shed for his tractor next to the barn.
sentences.chinese: 那個農場主在穀倉邊蓋了一間拖拉機棚。
拖拉機走在路上鏗鏗地響。

sentences.english: He said the Taliban had asked him to bring the tractor and help them pull a tanker.
sentences.chinese: 他說，塔利班的人讓他們用拖拉機把燃油車拉出水”。
福萊納隨心直接拖拉機。

sentences.english: My brother had a gas station, a car and a tractor.
sentences.chinese: 我的個股有一個加油站，一輛汽車和一輛拖拉機。

sentences.english: There is a tractor in this farmyard.
sentences.chinese: 在這個農家庭院裏停着一臺拖拉機。

sentences.english: The third belief often leads to self-pity and procrastination.
sentences.chinese: 第三種信念通常會導致自怨自憐，和拖拉。

sentences.english: The tractor hauled the fertilizer away.

definition: to rub lightly/to move slowly/to dawdle/to dillydally/to pester/to nag
lit. wading in mud and water/a slovenly job/sloppy
(dialect) to dawdle/to waste time/also written 墨跡|墨迹[mo4 ji5]
to give up halfway (idiom); leave sth unfinished
never put off until tomorrow what you can do today (idiom)
pinyin: jin1 ri4 shi4 jin1 ri4 bi4
